greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Total number of parts in all compositions of n into distinct odd parts.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
maple: a:= proc(n) option remember; local l; l:=[b(n, n-1+irem(n,2))];
mathematica: Drop[ CoefficientList[ Series[Sum[k*k!*x^k^2/Product[1 - x^(2j), {j, 1, k}], {k, 1, 55}], {x, 0, 50}], x], 1] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Sep 08 2004 *)
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Sep 05 2004
ext: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, Sep 08 2004
